name: Budget Fnaf
description:
A 2D recreation of Fnaf 1

Made in 3 hours for Trijam#152, I think fnaf fits the theme leave me alone :)

I didnt have enough time to add foxy, lights or any sounds sooo heres a link to the good ol fnaf 1 song to play in the back ground :) 

Still think I did pretty well for thhe time given

Run the game fullscreen so it dont break
